title: Bloodbath - Unblessing the Purity (2008)
description:
This is the latest out from Bloodbath.  Don&#039;t wet your pants just yet, this is sadly only an EP.  I would&#039;ve wished for more, but both my hands got filled up with shit too fast.  Apparently they&#039;re also putting out a live album in the near future, which I&#039;m not too fond of, so you&#039;ll have to look elsewhere.  Four songs, Bloodbath, good, download, seed; you know the whole deal.

Bloodbath

Unblessing the Purity - (2008)

1. Blasting the Virginborn
2. Weak Aside
3. Sick Salvation
4. Mouth of Empty Praise
